title: Make LioCollyVibeThunder installable as a PWA and add an in-app install/help screen (store wrapping readiness)

requirements.text: Add a dedicated in-app Help / Install page that explains (in English) how users can install LioCollyVibeThunder on iOS and Android from the browser, and clarifies that App Store / Play Store listings require separate native packaging outside this web app build.

quotes: So can you wrap it up

acceptanceCriteria: A new page is accessible via a route in the app (e.g., from a visible link/button in the UI)
The page includes step-by-step install instructions for iOS Safari (Add to Home Screen) and Android Chrome (Install app / Add to Home Screen)
The page includes a clear note that publishing to Apple App Store / Google Play Store requires a separate native wrapper and store submission process not performed by this web deployment

requirements.text: Convert the web app into a Progressive Web App (PWA) by adding a web app manifest, required icon assets, and appropriate HTML meta/link tags so the app can be installed on mobile devices.

quotes: So can you wrap it up

acceptanceCriteria: A web app manifest file exists and is linked from the app HTML entry point
The manifest defines app name, short name, start URL, display mode, theme/background colors, and includes icon entries with common sizes
The HTML entry point includes required PWA links/meta (manifest link, theme-color, and Apple touch icon / capability tags)
On a mobile browser, the app is eligible for installation (browser shows install option when criteria are met)

requirements.text: Ensure required generated brand images are present as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are used where referenced in the UI (logo in header and hero banner on discovery page).

quotes: So can you wrap it up

acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and load without 404s: app-logo.dim_512x512.png and hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png
The discovery hero banner renders using /assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).

Do not modify files listed in frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Building or shipping actual native iOS/Android wrapper projects (e.g., Xcode/Android Studio, Capacitor/Cordova) as part of this codebase.
Submitting the app to Apple App Store or Google Play Store from this build.
Adding push notifications, WebSockets, or third-party auth providers.

required: App logo mark: microphone + lightning motif, flat vector style (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Mobile hero/banner illustration: songwriting notebook + phone + waveform, warm modern palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 6 small monochrome line icons (lyrics, template, rhyme, record, upload, message) (feature-icons.dim_256x256.png)
